Name: NUC: After The Blast
About the game: NUC: After The Blast is a game in the loot and survive, where your main objective is to find your family after the nucleer explosion. Try to find your family and survive. Try to find your family lost after the explosion Discord Explore Explore the environment and discover new places Crafting Craft and use new items. Features: Good Low-Poly design. Looting. Crafting. Zombies. Amazing musics. Achievements. Saving system
